translations: 起皱的；卷缩的；绉褶多的（crinkly 的变形）

sentences.sentence: But the city is also home to some of the crinkliest people you will ever see, their faces baked by the hot desert sun into relief maps of creases and furrows and crosshatching.
sentences.translation: 然而，这个城市也是皱“王"皱“后"们的渊薮，他们的脸在炙热的沙漠烈日的烘焙下，纵横交织成一幅沟壑丛生的“地形图"。
